site_name: Basement Ground Floor And First Floor Flat
description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 19 April 2024 (RN: 24/00583/FULL) for the: 'Addition of a mansard storey with dormer windows to front elevation, reconfiguration of first floor windows to front elevation, addition of a concealed roof terrace to provide private external space, replacement and relocation of existing front door (No. 42A). Alterations to fenestration and doors to front and rear elevations, the addition of conservation skylights to concealed roof pitches, refurbishment of the rear terrace, to include upgraded railings, addition of a new spiral stair linking the terrace and garden inclusion of narrow walk on skylights, addition of a pavement light within existing curtilage to bring light into vaults below and internal alterations (No. 42)'. NAMELY, to allow addition of 3 no. conservation roof lights within mansard roof; removal of the ground floor recess within the front elevation; update the form of the ground floor doors; update the form of the lintels over the rear windows to rubbed arch; additional glazing bars to the front elevation windows; and update the lower ground floor wall external finish to render.
